definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: [[[ט]]:] pl. [[הַפּׂתוֹת לְדַלְתוֹת הַבַּיִת]] 1Ki 7:50 i.e. prob. the sockets above and below, in which the door-pivots turned (performing office of mod. hinges); sg. sf. [[פֳּתְהֵן]] Is 3:17 (Ges:§ 91f), prob., si vera l., their secret parts, cardo femina (so Thes and most); but read perh. [[חֶרְפַּתְהֵן]] Bachm:SK. 1894, 650 Kit (in Di) Marti; > [[פִּאַתְהֵן]] Sta ZAW vi (1886), 336, cf. Vulgate Di.
